item.title: Ivana add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Ivana Hruba
item.description: "It began with a perfect plan. Shape-wise we had a circle, a simple uncomplicated curve to guide us comfortably from one thing to another, an easy predictable ride promising a natural progression from A to B, C and D, and so on until we reached our destination. But somewhere down that smooth line, I think around F, it all went pear-shaped." -- Ivana Hruba

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Peter Clenott
item.description: "Beware, ye Gods, for the sun is up and I am awake." -- Peter Clenott

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Ivana Hruba
item.description: "Do not stand downwind from a sweaty person..." -- Ivana Hruba

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Ivana Hruba
item.description: "I've always felt I deserved a wider audience, so thank you for reading this." -- Ivana Hruba

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Bauvard
item.description: "A man wrapped up in himself always suffocates. But his loved ones will forever hold in their hearts the memory of that Christmas." -- Bauvard

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "I’m not waiting until my hair turns white to become patient and wise. Nope, I’m dyeing my hair tonight." -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "I want to gather up all the ink cartridges in the universe, because somewhere, mixed in with all that ink, is the next great American novel. And I’d love nothing more than to drink it." -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Ivana Hruba
item.description: "I read this on the gates to a village cemetery: What you are, we used to be. What we are, you’re going to be. — It puts things in perspective, doesn’t it?" -- Ivana Hruba

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "I cut an inch off of every straw I see, just to make the world suck a little less. " -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "The only gift I have to give, is the ability to receive. If giving is a gift, and it surely is, then my gift to you is to allow you to give to me." -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "I consider conversations with people to be mind exercises, but I don't want to pull a muscle, so I stretch a lot. That's why I'm constantly either rolling my eyes or yawning." -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "If loving someone is putting them in a straitjacket and kicking them down a flight of stairs, then yes, I have loved a few people." -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Dark Jar Tin Zoo
item.description: "Making love to me is amazing. Wait, I meant: making love, to me, is amazing. The absence of two little commas nearly transformed me into a sex god. " -- Dark Jar Tin Zoo

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Dora J. Arod
item.description: "This book is full of empty love quotes. If you are looking for the meaning of life and love, then this book is for you. You won’t find the answers here, of course, but you’ll be more encouraged than ever to keep on looking. Or maybe you’ll be discouraged. Either way, I’ll have your money, and you’ll have no answers. Sounds like a fair deal to me. " -- Dora J. Arod

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "Love is a circular emotion that surrounds you, like a hug. Or a noose. " -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "When three women all ignore each other, and each ignores me, it reminds me of Dark Jar Tin Zoo’s definition of love. Love is isn’t—even when it isn’t." -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Ivana add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "I had a dream about you. You were storing my brain in a pickle jar in the fridge, and I only discovered it when I went to garnish my hamburger. Mindless and hungry, I was a US politician’s ideal voter." -- Jarod Kintz
